thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 4 of 168
thread.title: zellner

author: zellner
title: zellner
text: this is my first experience buying prescription lenses (as opposed to just frames) on-line and i have to say the experience throughout was excellent. selecting the frames i wanted (difficult to find), inputting my prescription and completing the order process was simple and efficient. my questions were answered promptly via email; and the shipper, fedex, was attentive and responsive to my concerns regarding a delivery delay due to weather in my area. i will be using smartbuyglasses again.
